meanings.definition: A promise or assurance that something will be done or will happen.
meanings.sent1: The store's guarantee ensures you can return the item if it doesn't work.
meanings.sent2: The warranty is a guarantee that the product will be replaced if it malfunctions.
meanings.sent3: His guarantee to always bring dessert to the potluck made him a favorite among his friends.
meanings.sent4: The guarantee of a bright future motivated her to work hard in school.
meanings.sent5: The guarantee of a full refund gave her peace of mind when making the purchase.

meanings.definition: Something that assures a particular outcome or condition.
meanings.sent1: The money-back guarantee convinced her to try the new product.
meanings.sent2: His confident smile was a guarantee of his success in the competition.
meanings.sent3: The guarantee of sunny weather for the picnic turned out to be a pleasant surprise.
meanings.sent4: The old lighthouse stood as a silent guarantee of safety for the sailors.
meanings.sent5: The handshake was a guarantee of their agreement to the deal.
